file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 25-61-02-04 - ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the Emergency Locator Transmitter (ELT) Remote Switch Panel. B. The ELT Remote Switch Panel is installed on the instrument panel. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL (ELT AR- ALL 25-61-02-000-801-A TEX) - REMOVAL ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL (ELT AR- ALL 25-61-02-400-801-A TEX) - INSTALLATION ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL (ELT SA- ALL 25-61-02-000-802-A TORI) - REMOVAL ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL (ELT SA- ALL 25-61-02-400-802-A TORI) - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 25-61-02 Page 1 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL (ELT ARTEX) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the ELT remote switch panel (ELT ARTEX). B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit - instrument panel H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the ELT circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Get access to the ELT remote switch panel, on the instrument panel. I. Removal SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the four screws which attach the ELT remote switch panel to the instrument panel. (2) Disconnect the connector from behind the ELT remote switch panel. (3) Remove the ELT remote switch panel. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-61-02 Page 2 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL ELT Remote Switch Panel (ELT ARTEX) - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONES 223 224 1 2 B B DET. A DET. B 1 AIRCRAFT WITH RMU INSTALLED ON CONTROL PEDESTAL 2 AIRCRAFT WITH RMU INSTALLED ON MAIN INSTRUMENT PANEL 145AMM250020.MCE B EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 25-61-02 Page 3 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL (ELT ARTEX) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the ELT remote switch panel (ELT ARTEX). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER SYSTEM AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-801-A/500 (ELT 110-4) - OPERATIONAL CHECK EMERGENCY LOCATOR TRANSMITTER SYSTEM AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-803-A/500 (ELT C406-2) - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit - instrument panel I. Installation SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the connector behind the ELT remote switch panel. (2) Install and attach the ELT remote switch panel to the instrument panel. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the ELT circuit breaker and close it. (2) (FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELT ARTEX 110-4) Do the Emergency Locator Transmitter System - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-61-02 Page 4 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) (FOR AIRCRAFT WITH ELT ARTEX C406-2) Do the Emergency Locator Transmitter System - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-803-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 25-61-02 Page 5 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-02-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL (ELT SATORI) - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the ELT remote switch panel (ELT SATORI). B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit - instrument panel H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the ELT circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it. (2) Get access to the ELT remote switch panel, on the instrument panel. I. Removal SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Remove the four screws (3) which attach the ELT remote switch panel (2) to the instrument panel. (2) Disconnect the connector (1) from behind the ELT remote switch panel (2). (3) Remove the ELT remote switch panel (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 25-61-02 Page 6 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 25-61-02-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. ELT REMOTE SWITCH PANEL (ELT SATORI) - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the ELT remote switch panel (ELT SATORI). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION EMERGENCY-LOCATOR-TRANSMITTER SYSTEM AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-802-A/500 (ELT SATORI) - OPERATIONAL CHECK C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit - instrument panel I. Installation SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Connect the connector (1) behind the ELT remote switch panel (2). (2) Install and attach the ELT remote switch panel (2) to the instrument panel. J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from the ELT circuit breaker and close it. (2) Do the Emergency Locator Transmitter System (ELT SATORI) - Operational Check ( AMM TASK 25-61-00-700-802-A/500).
